death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北京医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级正职领导人，被视为中共八大元老之一。曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中共北京市委第一书记等职，是中华人民共和国法制体系的主要奠基人之一。
description.en: A political figure of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, a former leader of the highest state level, and considered one of the Eight Great Elders of the CCP. He served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and First Secretary of the CCP Beijing Municipal Committee, and was one of the main founders of the legal system of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 彭真的妻子，文化大革命期间与彭真一同被迫害入狱。
description.en: Peng Zhen's wife, who was persecuted and imprisoned along with him during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 彭真的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 彭真的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 彭真的次子。
description.en: The second son of Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 彭真的三子。
description.en: The third son of Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 彭真的养女。
description.en: The adopted daughter of Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，介绍彭真加入中国共产党。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party who introduced Peng Zhen to the party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家、政治家，晋系军阀的代表人物。彭真曾领导反对其税收政策的斗争。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, representative of the Shanxi warlord clique. Peng Zhen led struggles against his tax policies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，曾任国家主席。在文革前委任彭真，并支持《二月提纲》，后在文革中被迫害致死。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the PRC. He appointed Peng Zhen before the Cultural Revolution and supported the 'February Outline', but was later persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。在文化大革命期间，他批评并下令撤销彭真主持制定的《二月提纲》，并将彭真打倒。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Chinese Communist Party, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. During the Cultural Revolution, he criticized and ordered the withdrawal of the 'February Outline' formulated under Peng Zhen's leadership, and subsequently purged Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾在东北战场与彭真存在分歧，并最终取代其东北局书记职务。文革后，彭真领导了对其反革命集团的审判工作。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who had disagreements with Peng Zhen in the Northeast theater and eventually replaced him as Secretary of the Northeast Bureau. After the Cultural Revolution, Peng Zhen led the trial of his counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国改革开放的总设计师。彭真与他同为中共八大元老，在中央书记处共事，并支持其部分政策，但在某些方面持保守立场。
description.en: The chief architect of China's reform and opening up. Peng Zhen, along with him, was one of the Eight Great Elders of the CCP, worked with him in the Central Secretariat, and supported some of his policies, while holding conservative positions on certain issues.

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，在中苏关系恶化期间，彭真曾在会议上与其发生激烈言语冲突。
description.en: A Soviet leader with whom Peng Zhen had a fierce verbal conflict at a conference during the deterioration of Sino-Soviet relations.

description.zh-cn: 历史学家，时任北京市副市长。其作品《海瑞罢官》被姚文元批判，成为文化大革命的导火索。彭真曾反对这一政治攻击。
description.en: A historian and then-deputy mayor of Beijing. His work 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' was criticized by Yao Wenyuan, becoming a trigger for the Cultural Revolution. Peng Zhen opposed this political attack.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，其文章《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》是文化大革命的导火索之一，遭到彭真的反对。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four', his article 'On the New Historical Drama Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' was one of the triggers of the Cultural Revolution and was opposed by Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记，在1987年的“党内民主生活会”上遭到彭真等人的攻击和批评，最终非正常下野。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, who was attacked and criticized by Peng Zhen and others at a 'Party democratic life meeting' in 1987, ultimately leading to his unorthodox removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记，在六四事件中因立场与高层相左而被免职。彭真支持解除其职务。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, who was dismissed from his post during the Tiananmen Square protests due to his differing stance from the high-level leadership. Peng Zhen supported his removal.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的妻子，“四人帮”核心成员。在文化大革命中是打倒彭真的主要推手之一。文革后，彭真领导了对其反革命集团的审判工作。
description.en: Mao Zedong's wife and a core member of the 'Gang of Four'. She was one of the main drivers behind Peng Zhen's downfall during the Cultural Revolution. After the Cultural Revolution, Peng Zhen led the trial of her counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任全国人大常委会委员长，彭真是其该职务的继任者。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China and former Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, succeeded in this role by Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，接替彭真担任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China who succeeded Peng Zhen as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 彭真于1922年进入该校学习，并在此接受了马克思主义。
description.en: Peng Zhen entered this school in 1922 and was introduced to Marxism here.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，彭真是其重要领导人之一。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, of which Peng Zhen was a key leader.

description.zh-cn: 为领导意识形态领域斗争而设立的机构，由彭真担任组长。后因制定《二月提纲》而被毛泽东下令撤销。
description.en: An body established to lead ideological struggles, with Peng Zhen as its head. It was later disbanded by order of Mao Zedong for formulating the 'February Outline'.

en: Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 指在1980年代至1990年代间，在中华人民共和国拥有实际决策权的一批中国共产党元老，彭真是其中之一。
description.en: Refers to a group of elderly CCP veterans who held de facto decision-making power in the People's Republic of China during the 1980s and 1990s. Peng Zhen was one of them.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。彭真曾担任其委员长、副委员长及秘书长等职。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China. Peng Zhen served as its Chairman, Vice Chairman, and Secretary-General.

en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的直属机构，负责领导全国政法工作。彭真是文革后该委员会的首任书记。
description.en: A directly affiliated organ of the CCP Central Committee responsible for leading national political and legal affairs. Peng Zhen was the first secretary of this commission after the Cultural Revolution.

en: Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques

description.zh-cn: 对文化大革命中林彪和“四人帮”两个集团的合称，文革后受到审判。彭真任两案审判指导委员会主任，领导了审判工作。
description.en: A collective term for the cliques of Lin Biao and the 'Gang of Four' during the Cultural Revolution, who were tried after its conclusion. Peng Zhen served as the director of the trial steering committee, leading the judicial process.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。彭真是该运动初期最早被打倒的高级领导人之一。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong. Peng Zhen was one of the first high-ranking leaders to be purged in the early stages of this movement.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的政治事件。彭真大力支持实施军事戒严以应对该事件。
description.en: A political event that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, in 1989. Peng Zhen strongly supported the implementation of martial law in response to the event.

zh-cn: 关于当前学术讨论的汇报提纲

description.zh-cn: 由彭真主持的文化革命五人小组起草的汇报提纲，试图将学术问题与政治分离，但很快被毛泽东否定并撤销，成为彭真被打倒的直接原因。
description.en: A report outline drafted by the Group of Five led by Peng Zhen, which attempted to separate academic issues from politics. It was quickly repudiated and withdrawn by Mao Zedong, becoming the direct cause of Peng Zhen's downfall.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会通知

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局扩大会议通过的文件，标志着文化大革命的全面发动。该文件点名批判了彭真，撤销了《二月提纲》和文化革命五人小组。
description.en: A document passed by an enlarged meeting of the CCP Politburo, marking the full-scale launch of the Cultural Revolution. The document criticized Peng Zhen by name and rescinded the 'February Outline' and the Group of Five.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China (1982)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的现行宪法。彭真担任宪法修改委员会副主任委员，领导了该宪法的制定工作，重新确立了“法律面前人人平等”的原则。
description.en: The current constitution of the People's Republic of China. Peng Zhen served as the vice-chairman of the Constitution Revision Committee, led the drafting of this constitution, and re-established the principle of 'equality before the law'.

description.zh-cn: 彭真与张洁清于1939年在延安结婚，直至1997年彭真逝世。
description.en: Peng Zhen and Zhang Jieqing married in Yan'an in 1939 and remained so until Peng Zhen's death in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 刘朝兰是彭真的养女。
description.en: Liu Chaolan is the adopted daughter of Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 1922年，彭真进入山西省省立第一中学（后来的太原市第五中学校）学习。
description.en: In 1922, Peng Zhen began his studies at the Shanxi Provincial First Middle School (later Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School).

description.zh-cn: 1923年冬，经高君宇介绍，彭真加入中国共产党。
description.en: In the winter of 1923, Peng Zhen joined the Chinese Communist Party through the introduction of Gao Junyu.

description.zh-cn: 1925年5月，彭真参加并领导了反对阎锡山强征房屋估价税的斗争。
description.en: In May 1925, Peng Zhen participated in and led the struggle against the house valuation tax imposed by Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 1936年4月，刘少奇委任彭真为中共中央北方局组织部部长。
description.en: In April 1936, Liu Shaoqi appointed Peng Zhen as the Director of the Organization Department of the Northern Bureau of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 因在四平战役中的军事失败和与林彪等人的分歧，彭真于1946年6月16日被免去中共中央东北局书记职务，由林彪接任。
description.en: Due to military failures in the Siping Campaign and disagreements with Lin Biao and others, Peng Zhen was removed from his post as Secretary of the CCP Northeast Bureau on June 16, 1946, and was succeeded by Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 1960年6月，在布加勒斯特会议上，彭真与苏联领导人赫鲁晓夫就中苏关系问题发生激烈的言语冲突。
description.en: In June 1960, at the Bucharest Conference, Peng Zhen had a fierce verbal conflict with Soviet leader Nikita Khrushchev over issues concerning Sino-Soviet relations.

description.zh-cn: 彭真作为文化革命五人小组组长，主持起草了《二月提纲》。
description.en: As the head of the Group of Five, Peng Zhen presided over the drafting of the 'February Outline'.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持中共中央政治局常委会会议，讨论通过了《二月提纲》。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over a meeting of the Standing Committee of the CCP Politburo, which discussed and approved the 'February Outline'.

description.zh-cn: 1966年3月，毛泽东批评《二月提纲》是错误的，并指令向全党下达撤销通知。
description.en: In March 1966, Mao Zedong criticized the 'February Outline' as erroneous and ordered that a notice of its withdrawal be issued to the entire party.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》宣布撤销《二月提纲》。
description.en: The 'May 16 Notification' announced the withdrawal of the 'February Outline'.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》点名批判彭真，随后其被停止中央书记处书记、撤销北京市委第一书记等职务。
description.en: The 'May 16 Notification' criticized Peng Zhen by name, and he was subsequently suspended from his post as Secretary of the Central Secretariat and removed as First Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》宣布撤销文化革命五人小组。
description.en: The 'May 16 Notification' announced the disbandment of the Group of Five.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，彭真被免职、监禁和流放，直到1978年12月才回到北京。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Peng Zhen was dismissed, imprisoned, and exiled, not returning to Beijing until December 1978.

description.zh-cn: 彭真任两案审判指导委员会主任，统一领导审判“林彪、江青反革命集团”的工作。
description.en: Peng Zhen served as the director of the trial steering committee, uniformly leading the work of trying the 'Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

description.zh-cn: 彭真担任宪法修改委员会副主任委员，领导了1982年宪法的起草和制定工作。
description.en: Peng Zhen served as the vice-chairman of the Constitution Revision Committee, leading the drafting and formulation of the 1982 Constitution.

description.zh-cn: 在1987年的“党内民主生活会”上，彭真率先对时任中共中央总书记胡耀邦进行攻击和批评，最终促使胡耀邦非正常下野。
description.en: At a 'Party democratic life meeting' in 1987, Peng Zhen took the lead in attacking and criticizing then-General Secretary Hu Yaobang, ultimately contributing to Hu's unorthodox removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，彭真大力支持实施军事戒严。
description.en: During the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989, Peng Zhen strongly supported the implementation of martial law.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，彭真支持解除赵紫阳的职务。
description.en: During the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989, Peng Zhen supported the removal of Zhao Ziyang from his posts.

description.zh-cn: 彭真被视为邓小平主政时期的中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Peng Zhen is considered one of the Eight Great Elders of the CCP during Deng Xiaoping's era.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 彭真于1983年至1988年担任第六届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Peng Zhen served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 6th National People's Congress from 1983 to 1988.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，彭真卸任全国人大常委会委员长，由万里接任。
description.en: In 1988, Peng Zhen stepped down as Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee and was succeeded by Wan Li.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，彭真接替叶剑英出任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: In 1983, Peng Zhen succeeded Ye Jianying as Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1980年，彭真担任恢复设立后的中央政法委员会首任书记。
description.en: In 1980, Peng Zhen became the first secretary of the re-established Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.
